help-file.title: SKILL_AVENGER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills available to the avenger class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 2h slashing, bandage, battle orders, carve, climb, dodge, double attack, first aid, fishing, hitall, kick, mine, parry, riposte, swim 11th level: flank, battle senses 21st level: gaze 26th level: switch opponents, holy blade 36th level: command aura 51st level: triple attack 56th level: quadruple attack
Avenger Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Lightbringer, Punisher.
